877210.name: Hyper Sentinel Demo
877210.description:
A face-melting, pixel-pumping arcade shoot 'em up featuring awesome power-ups, epic boss battles and spectacular effects at a blistering 60fps. In this demo version, you can blast into battle against giant space destroyers in three levels from Arcade Mode, and experience the world's first interactive livestream arcade game in Mixer Mode.





Created in collaboration with Microsoft Mixer, the pioneering Mixer Mode allows viewers of your live-stream to interact in real-time, launching enemies, asteroids, rockets and power-ups into the game at the click of the button in order to attack or assist the streamer.
877210.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
